channel.title: Help changing spell graphics!
channel.description: for some reason when i would change a spells graphics ,.. it only changes the graphic of when i attack other players but it goes back to the original graphic when i attack an npc =( any1 know y?

item.title: Help changing spell graphics!

item.description:

[quote=“superbum1, post:5, topic:44646”]u need a gfx list cuz if u do i have one[/quote]Hey you have full objects list and/or emote list too?
I’d like to have all 3. Emotes, GFX, Objects
ty.

item.title: Help changing spell graphics!
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

There is an if part for every spell code, or even more, you have to enter it to the one needing the runes.
like:

if(has.item == 556

or something like this. I’m sure there is “has.item” part in it, so you could also use search

Read full topic

item.title: Help changing spell graphics!
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“killa12345, post:3, topic:44646”]k ill start looking =p ty[br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2007, 07:39:48 PM[/size][hr]ty that worked =)…

also is there a way to make spells admin only?[/quote]Simple. search for an “if” part in the code. Put in “&& playerRights >= 2” the “&&” means another condition, and its the player rights. If it’s higer, or equals 2(admin) then it will run the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Help changing spell graphics!
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“killa12345, post:1, topic:44646”]for some reason when i would change a spells graphics ,… it only changes the graphic of when i attack other players but it goes back to the original graphic when i attack an npc =( any1 know y?[/quote]There must be an other void or something where the server make the graphic for the npc attacks.
So, sarch for an other attack like what you’re modifyng, you might find what you need.
Hope i could help.

Read full topic
